showScoreExcerpt:

The music is catchy and tuneful, if forgettable...The band, onstage and in the pit is excellent...The dancing is fabulous...The fact that the script is so predictable is the show's principal problem. I kept trying to think of ways to make the book more interesting...For all its virtues, 'Bandstand' is saddled with a book that resembles a 1940s B musical...The war flashbacks are pretty cheesy."
